contents.name: Unsalted Butter
contents.note: chilled, cut into ½ in pieces

steps: In a medium bowl, toss together the flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt until combined. Add the butter and toss to coat, then use your fingertips to work the butter into the flour mixture until no visible pieces of butter or floury spots remain. It should naturally clump together and hold its shape when squeezed. Cover and refrigerate the crumble until ready to use.

notes.title: Do Ahead
notes.content: The crumble mixture, covered and refrigerated, will keep up to 4 days.

notes.title: Almond Crumble
notes.content: Substitute 1 cup sliced almonds for the oats.

notes.title: Buckwheat Crumble
notes.content: Replace ¼ cup of the all-purpose flour with ¼ cup buckwheat flour.
